pages.text: $(li)The Moose Antler can be used to craft the $(l:patchouli:armors/moose_headgear)Antler Headdress$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can be only be dropped by a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/moose)Moose$(/l) after three to five days.$(br)$(li)Maybe it is a good idea following it until this creature drops this item.
